Springdale.Johnson Township, Washington County, Ark:
Johnson Township is one of thirty-seven townships in Washington County, Arkansas, USA. As of the 2000 census, its total population was 3,076.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Johnson Township covers an area of 8.9 square miles (23 km2), all land.


=== Cities, towns, villages ===
Gulley
Johnson


=== Cemeteries ===
The township contains Stuckey Cemetery.
